
cache
=====

These are cache entities....

**Entities**

 * :doc:`PoC.cache.mem <cache_mem>` Cache with PoC's "mem" interface based
   on :doc:`PoC.cache.par2 <cache_par2>` and including a cache controller.
 * :doc:`PoC.cache.par <cache_par>` Cache with parallel tag-unit and
   data memory (using infered memory).
 * :doc:`PoC.cache.par2 <cache_par2>` Cache with parallel tag-unit and
   data memory (using :doc:`PoC.mem.ocram.sp <../mem/ocram/ocram_sp>`).
 * :doc:`PoC.cache.tagunit_par <cache_tagunit_par>` Tag-Unit with
   parallel tag comparison.
 * :doc:`PoC.cache.tagunit_seq <cache_tagunit_seq>` Tag-Unit with
   sequential tag comparison.

   :hidden:

   cache_mem
   cache_par
   cache_par2
   cache_replacement_policy
   cache_tagunit_par
   cache_tagunit_seq
